code: const validation=data=>{const errors={};if(!/^[a-zA-ZñÑáÁéÉíÍóÓúÚüÜ\s0-9]{6,}$/.test(data.name)){errors.name='debe tener al menos seis caracteres, y no contener simbolos';}if(!(data.image.endsWith(".jpg")||data.image.endsWith(".png")||data.image.endsWith(".svg"))){errors.image='Enter a .svg, .jpg or .png URL for "image".';}if(!data.name){errors.name='';}if(!data.image){errors.image='';}return errors;};export default validation;
